Missy was simply amazed by this recent development. Not only had she been given the ability to grow at will, but she had gained the power of a goddess to boot! Now she could grow as big as she wanted without worry; she would still be able to breath even if she passed through the atmosphere, and any damage that she might have caused during her growth could be repaired with a mere thought! She had everything that she could have ever wanted, and now was the perfect opportunity to test these new powers out.

Opening the window to her bedroom, she leaped out and landed safely on the ground below. Having just survived a fall from a second floor window without a single scratch on her, Missy began to giggle with glee at her new power. She then began to concentrate on making herself grow. Within moments, Missy had already enlarged herself to an amazing size of 200 feet tall! Looking around at her feet, she was amazed to see that there wasn't any damage done during her growth. She realized that her powers must have subconsciously protected the surroundings from destruction, and she was relived that she wouldn't need to repair anything now.

Missy simply began to laugh out loud at the sheer amount of excitement that she was feeling right now. She was happier now than she had ever been before, and being a goddess now, she felt that it was somewhat her duty to spread some of that happiness around. She knew that nothing was impossible for her now, so she could only begin to imagine the possibilities of how to help people out now.

After a bit of thought, Missy decided to use her powers to...
11431.title: The rise of a gentle goddess

choices: Missy makes it to Lacy's house without problem.
She catches the attention of a news helicopter on the way.
114312.content:
Missy gave in to a fit of giggles. 200 feet tall now, all the powers of a goddess, and she didn't have to repair anything yet. It was like a dream come true for her, and it was! She had thought briefly about using her new powers to guarantee world peace, but unless she forced the world leaders and every man, woman, and child into going along with it, world peace might not be accepted by everyone on Earth. She could force people to, yes, bend them to her will in the name of world peace, but that would effectively taking the will of humanity away. And she felt that would be abusing her new powers, and preferred that it should come naturally, not forced. However...perhaps she could help encourage that ideal in people by helping out with their daily lives, starting with her friends and family?

"Baby steps, Missy. I can start with the people I know and love most, helping them out with their day to day lives, and work my way up from there. And if all this doesn't work out, well I could still entertain myself by growing to the size of Jupiter or the Sun or something, and I can still have a clear conscience by ensuring I either don't break anything or instantly repair anything if I do..." Missy thought aloud. She still loved the idea of growing bigger and bigger, 200 feet for her was not even scratching the surface. Heck even the size of the Sun would hardly be a stepping stone, as she would love to get much, MUCH bigger than that. But for now, she wanted to share her happiness and help someone. She finally decided to head over to her best friend Lacy's place since the rest of her family wasn't home. With a thought, her house closed and locked all its doors and windows. She could replace anything stolen, but she'd rather not wind up being grounded for not locking up.

Missy mused, "Hm, Lacy's place is a few blocks from here. And while this size could get me there pretty quickly, I think I'd like to get there even faster. Teleport, or grow? Ha! I'll take door number two!" And with that, Missy focused on growing. Not wishing to be naked, she made sure to also focus on her clothes so they'd grow with her. Still, she was barefoot and held no desire to put even a pair of sandals on. She could literally walk on water or clouds if she wanted; footwear was unnecessary now. In a matter of moments, her height doubled to 400 feet, then redoubled to 800. It felt so incredible, almost intoxicating, but she kept herself in control and willed herself to a stop at 1000 feet. "This will do." Missy said with a giggle. Making sure that nothing was out of place, not even a huge human footprint, she walked onward to her best friend's house.

Her footfalls could be felt for almost a mile away, and some people turned to the source of the oddly rhythmically paced shaking, only to come face to face (well, foot) with the 1000 foot tall Missy. She didn't pause, but she did cheerfully wave hello to everyone she encountered like it was the most normal thing in the world. (and indeed, for Missy it now effectively was) These people had mixed reactions, varying from stammering incoherently for minutes after she passed to one man vowing to lay off the heavy liquor from now on.
114312.title: Goddess Missy starts small.

1143122.content:
As Missy traveled to Lacy's place, her giant head of chestnut brown hair caught the attention of a news crew. It wasn't everyday that a 1000 foot tall young woman went stomping past, and it had been a somewhat uneventful day this morning, so the crew turned the helicopter to follow the giantess who was fully clothed other than being barefoot. Hearing the thrum of the helicopter's rotor, Missy giggled with delight. She was going to be on TV! Unless you were a news anchor, it wasn't everyday that you got to be on TV. She lured the crew to a nearby radio tower, which she was still bigger than by quite a margin right now, and then stopped and turned to face the copter smiling as the crew went through their breaking news procedure. Missy held back a snicker when it was announced to be for GTS news; ever since she was 14 or so once she had discovered the online giantess fetish community and that there were others who either dreamed to see girls grow big or people shrink down to miniscule sizes she had giggled at the news station's coincidental name. 6 years later had done little to dull the humor, but here she was trying to be polite.

"Miss giantess! Can we have your name?" The reporter shouted over the thump of the rotors, though Missy heard him just fine.

"Certainly. I'm Missy. Pleased to meet you guys in person! I watch your news station all the time at home!" Missy turned her head ever so slightly to look directly at the camera and said, "Hi mom!"

"How did you grow so big? Were you always this large?"

"No, I wasn't, and I'm not always this big. As for how I grew, that's simple. I thought about growing this big, so I did! Like this! Oh! You guys might want to back up a bit... I wouldn't want you guys running into me." Missy responded, and once the helicopter pulled back about a yard she focused on growing some more. Really, she was only too happy to. Both 1100 and 1200 feet were passed in quick succession, and Missy stopped at an astounding 1300 feet tall. She kept her voice from wreaking havoc on the news crew's sound equipment as she giggled again.

"W-what is your goal? Do you plan to conquer the United States? The world?" The reporter asked nervously, having just seen Missy's power firsthand.

Missy burst out into laughter, though still careful not to rupture anyone's eardrums or ruin the sound equipment as she replied, "Conquer the world? HA! Good one, guys! The only interest in the world I have is for the people of the world to be able to get along with one another. Settle their differences peacefully instead of blowing the crap outta one another. My goal is actually to just help people with their daily lives where I can. I share a bit of joy with someone, they pass it along, and hopefully the world becomes a happier, friendlier place."

"You heard it here first!" The reporter wrapped up the story of a lifetime. Missy meanwhile decided to gently rub her finger against the radio tower, reversing years of rust and corrosion to the old structure and making it function better than new. She also made it MUCH more resilient to the elements. It would take a few thousand years minimum for it to get as bad as it was when she found it. Satisfied with her handiwork, she asked, "You guys did get all that growth and stuff on camera, right? I can go on my way?" The reporter was surprised that this giantess was asking them permission to head on her way when she could just swat them out of the air like one would a fly. Clearly she meant what she said on camera. "Er, yes, I believe we got everything we need. Y-you can go now, t-thank you..."

Missy came back down, but only to 1100 feet, and smiled. She said, "Ah. Good. I've still got a little ways ahead of me to my friend's place, and I'd like to get there while there's still daylight! Mom would kill me if I stayed out too late. Well, she could try, anyway. Honestly, I'm 20 now. I'm a grown woman, no pun intended, yet she still treats me like I'm 12 or something..." And with that, she continued on her way. Missy figured that short of the Apocalypse, nothing could spoil her mood today. "So much happiness, so little time to spread it even if I did halt it!"

11431221.content:
Missy reached Lacy's neighborhood a bit later than she had hoped, but since her only delay was being interviewed for the local news station, it was all good. She shrunk down to about a mere 20 feet as she more stealthily approached her friend's house, and then shot up to 500 feet once there. Missy tapped the door with her index finger, as she never used the doorbell. It just didn't feel as personal to her.

Lacy had been working on chores when she heard a knock on the door. Grunting in annoyance, she tried to ignore it only for it to continue. Finally, Lacy gave in and went to the door to open it, and encountered the biggest pair of feet she had seen in her life. Followed by the biggest girl she had ever seen in her life, who possessed a very familiar face and the biggest grin. "M-Missy? I-Is that you?" She stammered. Missy just kept smiling as she answered, "Hi Lacy! Can I come in?"

Lacy asked, fearfully, "Uh...aren't...aren't you just a bit too big to fit? I mean you could practically smash my house in just a few steps!" Missy shook her head, the smile not fading one bit, "Nonsense! I can never be too big! I'd love to outgrow this universe just to see what lies beyond, and then outgrow that too! But right now..." She shrunk back down to her original 5'5 height, a full 2 inches taller than her friend, and said while giggling like a madwoman, "See? Now I'm not too big to fit, am I?"

Once inside, Missy helped Lacy with her chores. In one instance, to clean the ceiling fans, she grew herself big enough to comfortably reach the top of the fan's blades without having to raise her arm past shoulder height. The part of the ceiling directly above and before her stretched upward out of the way while she cleaned, humming a little tune to herself. Finding it a little rickety, as though broken, she asked, "Has this fan always been rickety, Lacy?" To which the reply was, "Yeah, pretty much. I don't think it's ever worked right, and dad's never gotten around to trying to fix it...or replacing the damn thing. What, you want to tear it down? Be my guest if you can patch up the hole it'll leave behind..." Missy chuckled cheerfully and announced her intention, "Tear it down? After I just cleaned it? Are you nuts? I'm gonna make it work!" She manipulated the fan with her hand, gently fiddling with it for show while she used her power to get it to work as it should. Once done, she shrunk down again and tugged on the chain. The fan whirred to life as though it had always worked perfectly.

With utter amazement, Lacy asked, "How did you do that? And how did you bend away the ceiling like that?"

Missy responded with a tweaking of a line she heard somewhere, saying, "I'm your friendly neighborhood goddess-girl! And if you watched the news...wait, you didn't watch the news at noon, did you?" She pretended to pout with, "And I thought they got my good side, too..." Resuming her grin, Missy turned on the TV and turned to the local news station, which was just starting to play her interview, for Lacy. "Wha? You're on TV?!" "Yep, now watch. I'm not gonna reverse time again for you to catch it." was Missy's response.

Once the interview story had concluded, the TV channel fast-forwarded to what was currently on at the time when Missy returned it to when it should be, joking, "We now return to your regularly scheduled programming already in progress." And then squealed with delight at what happened to be on. "Ooh! Attack of the 50 Foot Woman! And I didn't even have to put it on the air myself! Awesome!" Lacy asked curiously, "If you can do whatever you want...why can't you make all the chores instantly done? And why are you barefoot?" And Missy answered, "I prefer a more personal touch. Especially with these powers. It feels more like I'm doing something. On the other hand, I wouldn't mind roasting marshmallows with the Sun. As for being barefoot...I couldn't be bothered to grab my shoes before I left. And if even stepping on a cactus does nothing to the soles of my feet...what's the point in wearing them? Fashion aside."
11431221.title: Missy continues to Lacy's house

114312211.content:
While Missy watched the movie with her friend Lacy, it being a favorite of theirs due to sharing a similar interest in the giantess fetish, she materialized freshly popped bags of popcorn and offered to share. "Popcorn?" Lacy happily accepted the offered back and tore in to it, making a slight mess of her blonde hair in her hurry. Missy giggled at her friend's enthusiasm, and the goddess girl made sure that any crumbs were teleported straight into the garbage can in the kitchen. ("I'm not going to allow a mess after we just cleaned your place on my watch!") After the movie was over, Missy spotted a picture of a boy on the coffee table with Lacy next to him, which perked her curiosity. "Ho ho... Looks like someone's got themselves a boyfriend! I assume he has a name?"

Lacy blushed a little as she answered, "That's Jason. He's a nice guy, he really is... But he gets picked on a lot, and hard by the bullies at college. Last time they sent him to the hospital with a black eye and some fractured ribs... You'd think these people would grow up by the time they go to college, but apparently not!"

Missy winced slightly. It certainly didn't sound good that her friend's boyfriend was getting beat up all the time. "Ouch. I hope he's alright now. Attractive boy like him, I can only imagine his bullies must have fallen out of the Ugly Tree when they were born and hit every branch on the way down. But seriously, nice catch, girl!"

Just then, the door opened and Lacy's brother came in. Upon seeing her, he did a double-take. "Whoa! You're that girl from the news! ...I thought you'd be..." "Taller?" Missy concluded with a smile, "I was at the time, but if I stayed that way I couldn't be in here hanging out with my friend, could I? Better to be sitting in the house instead of on it. Wouldn't you agree, Lacy?"

Lacy nodded in agreement and said, "I would think so. Although...I certainly wouldn't mind using Betelgeuse as a seat..." Her brother rolled his eyes and said, "You're so weird..."

Missy's thoughts returned to her friend. This was an opportunity to really help out a friend by scaring the ever-living crap out of some bullies. Then again, she could grant Lacy the same powers that she enjoyed, albeit disallowing her from stripping Missy of her powers and being able to take them away from Lacy if it proved to corrupt her like it could have done to Missy...

Missy decided that the one person she wanted to share this awesome new development with was with her girlfriend Lacy. Girlfriend as in friend who happened to be a girl, that is. They weren't dating. In time, it could change, but for now both girls were into guys more than other girls. Missy thought about her brother, but no one else was home yet to tell anything to. Still, she felt the need to write a note on the kitchen table in case anyone from her family came back. They were visiting, but had gone out shopping and didn't want them worrying - not that she or they would need to ever worry again, thanks to that strange and utterly adorable creature she had met just a couple minutes ago.

While not exactly her favorite colors, she still liked them and was grateful for them. Especially since they were slip on, as shoe laces and her didn't always mix, and enjoyed being able to just slip them on and go. I really like her, and she has the most gorgeous-" Missy placed a finger to his mouth to cut him off, smiling, "Blonde hair? I know. I'm Missy. Lacy is my friend. Say..." she noticed that his left eye was a bit bruised, and she knew Lacy would aim much, much lower on a guy she didn't like. Someplace no man ever wanted to be hit in. "What happened to your eye? Jason tells her...

115.content:
Missy's grandmother had given her a box filled with things passed down from generation to generation among the women of their family. She said that she wanted Missy to have it, and didn't want the family to squabble about who received it after her grandmother had passed on.

"Missy, you're the only girl in the family who respects tradition. All of your cousins went off and don't even call me. Since you're the only one who ever visits me, I want you to have this," Grandma said with a slight smile, handing her the battered old wooden box.

Missy took the box cautiously, wrapping her slender fingers around it and enjoying the sensation of age it seemed to possess. She began to open it, but her grandmother stopped her.

"No. Wait until I'm gone. There are things in there you may want me to explain, but I can't explain them any more than my grandmother could. We both know I don't have a lot longer to live. Just keep it safe until then."

Within weeks, Missy attended her grandmother's funeral, the only granddaughter in attendance. She felt deeply the loss of the old woman, but she was oddly excited at the prospect of opening the wooden box. Her grandmother's words had added a strong sense of mystery to the box.

When she opened it, she saw all sorts of things, including little wooden dolls and old thimbles, little keepsakes from years ago. She saw that her grandmother's wedding band was in the box and knew that someday she would add something to the box as well before she passed it on.

She was about to close the box when she noticed that the top liner was loose. She pulled at it until it came out neatly. A small golden coin fell from its hiding place.

Missy studied the coin with great interest. It appeared to be much, much older than any other item in the box. In college, one of her history professors had brought in a Roman coin to show them, and this coin looked to be at least that old. On one side of the coin was the figure of a small woman, her face barely perceptible but clearly a proud, noble face. On the other side was the same face, but the figure was much larger than the other, although the proportions were almost the same, the larger woman appearing more muscular than the smaller.

Missy liked the coin very much. She rubbed it carefully with a cloth to clean away the grime of many years until it shone a little less dully than before. She put the box away in her dresser, but decided to keep the coin out.

"For luck," she said, and flipped it into the air. It seemed to give off a slight glow as it twirled in the air. She caught it easily in her right hand and looked to see which side was facing up. "Big," she said, smiling. She liked the bigger side anyway.

Within moments, Missy began to feel a warm sensation in the pit of her stomach. The warmth spread slowly throughout her body. Although it puzzled her, she found the sensation to be quite pleasurable. It was unlike any she had ever felt before, and as she became hotter and hotter, she gave herself over to the sensation.

She seemed to hear a voice in her mind whispering to her, "My child, receive the inheritance of your race. The Amazon blood has been kept silent too long in you. Let it awaken!" The voice was very loud as it finished and immediately disappeared. It sounded much like her own voice, and she instinctively knew it to be that of some ancient Amazonian ancestor.

"Yes," she whispered, "Let it awaken..."

Her slender frame began to shake as amazing amounts of transformative energy ran up and down her body. She felt like the energy was going to tear her apart, but it still felt wonderful. She closed her eyes tightly and took short, quick breaths.

"Awaken..." she whispered again, forming it into a chant. Each time she said the word, it was louder than the first until she was shouting the word at the top of her lungs. When she felt like she could shout no louder and like the energy was going to explode inside her, her eyes flew open and she began to see the world change around her.

She moved awkwardly across her room and stood in front of her full length mirror. She was wearing a sweater blouse buttoned down the front and a jean skirt that just concealed her knees. As she watched, the clothes seemed to become smaller and smaller.

She felt her bones lengthen. She could hear them crack as they shattered and reformed and shattered and reformed in order to compensate her growth.

Her slender frame thickened as her muscles began to grow. She realized that in order to possess the power of an Amazon, she would no longer be the thin little girl that once she was. She also realized that that was never who she had truly been anyway.

"I am an Amazon," she said confidently, watching as her body grew to meet her bold statement.

Her skirt slowly snuck up her leg, exposing her creamy white thighs. The hems along the side of the skirt split, giving her legs more room to grow.
